analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/4/0x214f96e84d3c0f2920bb90fec861be4925edf02b.sol:
	Contract HorseyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0x214f96e84d3c0f2920bb90fec861be4925edf02b.sol#200-201)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/4/0x214f96e84d3c0f2920bb90fec861be4925edf02b.sol:
